func.title: MaterialName

param.name: material_index
param.desc: Index of the material of which you want to know the name.

func.desc: Returns the internal (technical) name of a material.

example.code: GetCursor(0)->Message("You clonk is standing on %s.", MaterialName(GetCursor(0)->GetMaterial(0, 12)));
example.text: Displays on what type of material the first player's selected clonk is standing.
